sudo-unsudo: {{doc-important|Do not translate {{int:sudo-unsudo-submit}}.}} Refers to {{msg-mw|Sudo-unsudo-submit}}. Used as welcome message. Parameters: * $1 - username of super user (with link) * $2 - username (with link) See also: * {{msg-mw|Sudo-success}}
sudo-success:
Used as welcome message. Parameters:
* $1 - username of super user (with link)
* $2 - username (with link)
See also:
